actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1047.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 6782 to permit marketing orders to include provisions concerning marketing promotion, including paid advertisement, of raisins and distribution among handlers of the pro rata costs of such promotion.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 6782 (Marketing orders for raisins).

titles.title: A resolution waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 6782 to permit marketing orders to include provisions concerning marketing promotion, including paid advertisement, of raisins and distribution among handlers of the pro rata costs of such promotion.
